text: Lousiest immigration, no priority lane for elders and baby. Introduced MyBorderPass but without considering baby. How baby can own a smartphone to register app and scan the QR? Also the staffs, just sitting there and ignoring us. Please la, learn from Singapore, sia sue jer Malaysian.

Friendly, fast and very convenient.
Kalang Immigration checkpoint of Malaysia border
While Johor (Woodland) checkpoint is very busy, Kalang is an alternative way to entry Malay. It isnt crowded and Offiicer is so nice. Dont have any illegal requirement.
A good point when coming to Malay
Habis semua bag dia nak scan. Singapore side only scan big lugage during peak hour.
Waiting long long time. Only few counter open during festive season. Terrible working schedule arrangement. 2 counter block but open only 1block during busy hour.
Clueless officers, confuses my MM2H approval letter with something else.
